perturbation.original_text: The term of the Franchise shall be twenty (20) years, commencing on January 1, 2016.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of the Franchise shall be twenty (20) years, commencing on January 1, 2016. Grantor reserves the right to terminate this Franchise at any time with thirty (30) days written notice to Grantee.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly defines the franchise term as 20 years. The added sentence gives the Grantor the right to terminate at any time with 30 days' notice. This contradicts the defined term and creates uncertainty regarding the actual duration of the franchise agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Grantee shall pay to Grantor a Franchise Fee which shall be calculated pursuant to this Section. It is understood that Grantee has or will enter into franchise agreements with the City of Roanoke (“Roanoke”) and the City of Salem (“Salem”) and the Town of Vinton (“Vinton”) (Grantor, Roanoke and Salem being hereinafter sometimes collectively referred to as the “localities” and singularly as a “locality”) with fee provisions identical to this one, and that the total annual Franchise Fee to be paid to the three localities in aggregate is $98,196 for calendar year 2016 (“base year total annual Franchise Fee”).
perturbation.changed_text: Grantee shall pay to Grantor a Franchise Fee which shall be calculated pursuant to this Section. It is understood that Grantee has or will enter into franchise agreements with the City of Roanoke (“Roanoke”) and the City of Salem (“Salem”) and the Town of Vinton (“Vinton”) (Grantor, Roanoke and Salem being hereinafter sometimes collectively referred to as the “localities” and singularly as a “locality”) with fee provisions identical to this one, and that the total annual Franchise Fee to be paid to the three localities in aggregate is $98,196 for calendar year 2016 (“base year total annual Franchise Fee”). However, the Grantor reserves the right to unilaterally adjust the franchise fee annually based on its perceived economic needs.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the Franchise Fee will be calculated according to Section 3. The added sentence gives the Grantor the right to unilaterally adjust the fee, contradicting the fee calculation established in the section and creating uncertainty about the actual franchise fee amount.

perturbation.original_text: Grantee shall during the term of this Franchise maintain at least one business office within the Territorial Limits of Grantor. Such office shall be open at least forty (40) hours per week for the conduct of business between Grantee and its customers.
perturbation.changed_text: Grantee shall during the term of this Franchise maintain at least one business office within the Territorial Limits of Grantor. Such office shall be open at least forty (40) hours per week for the conduct of business between Grantee and its customers. However, the Grantee may, at their sole discretion, operate the business office remotely without physical presence within the Territorial Limits of Grantor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates a physical business office within the Grantor's territory, open 40 hours per week. The added sentence gives the Grantee the option to operate remotely, contradicting the requirement of a physical presence. This creates uncertainty regarding the Grantee's obligation to maintain a physical office.
